com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupProgressBar

  • public class ScupProgressBar
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a progress bar. This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display the text string for progress using label widget.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STYLE_COLOR
      The progress bar is displayed with color.
      static int STYLE_IMAGE
      The progress bar is displayed with image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScupProgressBar

        public ScupProgressBar(ScupDialog dialog,
               int style)
        Create an ScupProgress instance.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog instance
        style - The progress thumb type. Support to types STYLE_COLOR and STYLE_IMAGE
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If style is not one of STYLE_COLOR or STYLE_IMAGE

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupProgressBar instance.
        If the progress is shown on the screen, progress should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setMin

        public void setMin(int minValue)
        Sets the minimum value of progress bar.
        Parameters:
        minValue - The minimum value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If minValue is greater than or equal to maxValue. Or minValue is negative.

        public void setMax(int maxValue)
        Sets the maximum value of progress bar.
        Parameters:
        maxValue - The maximum value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If maxValue is less than or equal to minValue. Or maxValue is zero or negative.

        public int getMax()
        Gets the maximum value of progress bar.

        The maximum value

      • setProgress

        public void setProgress(int progress)
        Sets the current progress to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        progress - The current progress.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If progress is invalid. progress should be between minValue and maxValue.
        See Also:
        getMin(), getMax()

      • getProgress

        public int getProgress()
        Gets the current progress.
        Returns:
        The current progress.

      • setStyle

        public void setStyle(int type)
        Sets the type of progress. the default type is STYLE_IMAGE. If you do no set the progress image, The default will be displayed.
        Parameters:
        type - the progress type.
        It is one of STYLE_IMAGE, or STYLE_COLOR.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If type is invalid.

      • setProgressColor

        public void setProgressColor(int color)
        Sets the progress color.
        Parameters:
        color - The progress color.

      • getProgressColor

        public int getProgressColor()
        Gets the progress color
        Returns:
        The color

      • setProgressImage

        public void setProgressImage(Bitmap[] bitmap)
        Sets the progress images. You can set the the start, middle, end of progress.
        If the start, end image is null, the progress is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by bitmap first item. And middle image is set by bitmap second item. end image is set by bitmap third item.
        If the middle image is null, exception will be occurred.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap array. the maximum size is 3.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If bitmap is null or length is not 3.

      • setProgressImage

        public void setProgressImage(int[] resIds)
        Sets the progress images. You can set the the start, middle, end of progress If the start, end image is null, the progress is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by resId first item. And middle image is set by resId second item. end image is set by resId third item.
        If the middle image resource Id is invalid, exception will be occurred.
        Parameters:
        resIds - The resource id array. the maximum size is PROGRESS_POSITION_MAX.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If resIds is null or resIds size is invalid or each resource is invalid.

      • setProgressBackgroundImage

        public void setProgressBackgroundImage(Bitmap[] bitmap)
        Sets the progress background images. You can set the the start, middle, end of progress background.
        If the start, end image is null, the progress background is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by bitmap first item. And middle image is set by bitmap second item. end image is set by bitmap third item.
        If the middle image is null, exception will be occurred.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap array. the maximum size is 3.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If bitmap is null or length is not 3. Or if bitmap middle image is null.

      • setProgressBackgroundImage

        public void setProgressBackgroundImage(int[] resIds)
        Sets the progress background images. You can set the the start, middle, end of progress background.
        If the start, end image is null, the progress background is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by resId first item. And middle image is set by resId second item. end image is set by resId third item.
        If the middle image resource Id is invalid, exception will be occurred.
        Parameters:
        resIds - The bitmap id array. the maximum size is 3.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If resIds size is invalid or each resource id is invalid.

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets the slider area padding.
        Parameters:
        left - The left padding in point units
        top - The top padding in point units
        right - The right padding in point units
        bottom - The bottom padding in point units
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If left, top, right or #bottom is negative.
        See Also:
        getPaddingLeft(), getPaddingTop(), getPaddingRight(), getPaddingBottom()
